name: Gizj
tag_list: web-2-0, content, aggregator, feeds, rss, digest, ajax
overview:
Gizj.com is a personal aggregator site where you can customize all of the content and feeds. Users can choose to have their page private or public. To begin using Gizj.com you must create your page by choosing modules. You can choose the language you want when you are search for modules and then you can perform a keyword search of the modules.

Once you find a module that interests you you can add it to your page by simply clicking on it and it will appear on the left side of the page. You can also copy and paste your favorite RSS feeds to your page as well. You can customize the appearance of the module, by choosing the color or modifying the title of the module.

There is a maximum of 15 modules for each page, if you want more you must create a new page. You can create icons for your pages making them personal or you can make your page private by only allowing access with a password. In order to save your pages you must register with Gizj.com. Gizj.com allows you to make a site that has all of the content you want so have fun with it.

Gizj is born with the objective to make available a free tool for the aggregation of services and contents and in a unique space, always accessible, up-to-date, private and completely personalizzabile.

The promoters of the project have initially developed it based on they own requirements, unsatisfied of the offer of similar services.

There was in fact need of a service that allowed in limited time to approach from every place to a personal space, in which finding news always updated on interesting topics for the reader. This is an alternative to specialistic and generalistic portals, too much far from the specific requirements of every visitor.
